name: Bart Gets Famous
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), John Swartzwelder, Bill Canterbury (staff writer), David X. Cohen (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Bart becomes an overnight sensation as the "I didn't do it" boy on Krusty the Clown's show.
